data.name: AddCertificateWindow_CreateCertFile_Desc
data.value: Enter a file location and password for your new digital lD file. You will need the password when you use the digital lD to sign or decrypt documents. Please make a note of the file location so that you can copy this file for backup or other purposes.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_CreateCertFile_FilenameEmptyMessage
data.value: The file name cannot be empty.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_CreateCertFile_FilenameInvalidMessage
data.value: Please enter a valid file name.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_CreateCertProps_Desc
data.value: Enter the identity information to be used for creating the self-signed certificate.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_CreateCertProps_NameEmptyMessage
data.value: The name can not be empty.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_ImportFile_Desc
data.value: Digital lD files generally have a PFX or P12 extension and these files usually contain private keys and public key certificates (used for signing and verification). To sign with a digital lD available as a file, follow the prompts to browse and select the file and type the password protecting the private key.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_Welcome_Desc
data.value: Add or create a digital ID to sign and encrypt documents. A Digital ID can be issued by a trusted third-party service. It contains a private key and a certificate with a public key. The private key is used to create the certificate-based signature. The certificate embedded in the digital ID is sent to others to verify your signature.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_Welcome_LabelCreateCert
data.value: A new digital ID I want to create now.

data.name: AddCertificateWindow_Welcome_LabelImportFile
data.value: An existing digital ID from a file.

data.name: AnnotationFileAttachmentOpenWarning
data.value: Are you sure to open the attachment?

data.name: AppSettingsDefaultDisplayTips
data.value: The default zoom setting applies only to the document you open for the first time.

data.name: AppSettingsFileAssociations_AlreadyDefaultMessage
data.value: XXX has already been set as the default app for PDF files.

data.name: AppSettingsLanguageRestartTips
data.value: Please restart PDFgear to apply the setting.

data.name: AppSettingsLaunchOCR
data.value: Prompt OCR when opening scanned PDFs.

data.name: AppSettingsLaunchStatusbar
data.value: Show bottom navigation bar when opening a PDF.

data.name: AppSettingsLaunchToolbar
data.value: Show toolbar when opening a PDF.

data.name: AppSettingsShowRightMenu
data.value: Show quick actions on text selection

data.name: BatchDeleteSelectNoneWarning
data.value: Select the annotations you want to delete

data.name: BatchDeleteWarning
data.value: Do you want to delete all the selected annotations?

data.name: BatchPrintRemoveAllMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove all files?

data.name: CategoryNameWinEmptyMessage
data.value: The category name cannot be empty.

data.name: CertificateManager_AddFile_Invalid_Message
data.value: The file is invalid. Please check the file and try again.

data.name: CertificateManager_DigitalIDs_Desc
data.value:
Digital ID is primarily used by the signer to prove identity and to create a digital signature. They can be issued by trusted third-party service providers based on files or other forms.
You can create a new digital ID. But it provides a low level of identity assurance and may not be acceptable in some cases.

data.name: CertificateManager_ExportSucceeded_Message
data.value: The certificate has been exported successfully.

data.name: CertificateManager_Remove_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the selected certificate(s)?

data.name: CertificateManager_Trust_Desc
data.value: Trust certificates are essentially digital certificates issued by recognized and trusted Certificate Authorities (CAs). They verify that the certificate issuers are trustworthy and that the public keys associated with the certificates belong to the entities they claim to represent.

data.name: ChatPanelMessageError_ContentFiltered
data.value: The content has been filtered possibly due to messages or articles containing content that violates policies.

data.name: ChatPanelMessageError_UserCanceled
data.value: The request has been canceled manually.

data.name: ChatPanelMessageWelcomeAction_compress
data.value: Compress this PDF using a high compression level.

data.name: ChatPanelMessageWelcomeAction_convert_from_pdf
data.value: Convert this PDF to Word format.

data.name: ChatPanelMessageWelcomeAction_protect_pdf
data.value: Add a password to protect this file.

data.name: ChatPanelMessageWelcomeAction_slide_show
data.value: Display this PDF in slide mode.

data.name: ChatPanelMessageWelcomeText1
data.value:
PDFgear Copilot is an AI tool designed to assist you in summarizing PDF, finding answers from PDF, editing PDF, converting PDF, managing PDF, and more, by simply chatting in natural language commands.
Examples:

data.name: ChatPanelMessageWelcomeText2
data.value: Click the examples above or input your command to start the chat.

data.name: CopilotClearHistoryTip
data.value: Are you sure to clear the chat history?

data.name: CopilotMessagesOverRemainingTips
data.value: The amount of 50 messages/file/day has been running out.

data.name: CopilotMessagesOverRemainingTipsContent
data.value: There will be another 50 messages available for this PDF tomorrow, or chat with another PDF for now.

data.name: CopilotSendButtonToolTips
data.value: Ctrl+Enter: Send message, Enter: Input new line

data.name: CopilotWelcomePageDesc
data.value: With PDFgear Copilot, your documents are becoming intelligent. It works great for commanding operations on PDFs and obtain precise information from them using natural language. Try chatting with your files right now.

data.name: CreateDigSignImportCertDialogDesc
data.value: Browse for a digital ID file. Digital ID files are password protected and require your password in order to be opened.

data.name: CreateDigSignImportCertErrorMessage_InvalidPassword
data.value: The file or password is invalid.

data.name: CreateDigSignImportCertErrorMessage_NotSupport
data.value: This certificate cannot be used for digital signatures.

data.name: CreateDigSignMessage_CertExpired
data.value: Unable to sign with an expired certificate.

data.name: CreateDigSignMessage_IncorrectPassword
data.value: The password is incorrect. Please re-enter the password.

data.name: CreateDigSignReason1
data.value: I am the author of this document

data.name: CreateDigSignReason4
data.value: I am approving this document with my legally binding signature

data.name: CreateDigSignReason5
data.value: I attest to the accuracy and integrity of this document

data.name: CreateDigSignReason6
data.value: I agree to the terms defined by the placement of my signature in this document

data.name: CreateDigSignReason7
data.value: I agree to specified parts of this document

data.value: Signed and all signatures are valid.

data.name: DigSignInfoIncludesEmbeddedTimestamp
data.value: The signature includes an embedded timestamp. Timestamp time: XXX

data.name: DigSignInfoNotAllowModify
data.value: The certifier has specified that no changes are allowed to be made to this document.

data.name: DigSignInfoTimeFromSignersDevice
data.value: Signing time is from the clock on the signer’s computer.

data.name: DigSignInfoValidAtTime
data.value: Signature was validated as of the secure (timestamp) time: XXX

data.name: DigSignInfoValidatedAsSigningTime
data.value: Signature was validated as of the signing time: XXX

data.name: DigSignResultValid
data.value: Signature is VALID, signed by XXX.

data.name: DigSignStatusHasBeenModified
data.value: The document has been modified since this signature was applied.

data.name: DigSignStatusHasNotBeenModified
data.value: The document has not been modified since this signature was applied.

data.name: DigSignStatusIdentityIsBroken
data.value: This signature is invalid because there are errors in the formatting or information contained in this signature.

data.name: DigSignStatusIdentityIsExpired
data.value: The signer's identity is unknown. The certificate has exceeded the time of validity.

data.name: DigSignStatusNotIncludedInTrustedCerts
data.value: The signer’s identity is unknown because it has not been included in your list of trusted certificates and none of its parent certificates are trusted certificates.

data.name: DigSignStatusValidWhenIssued
data.value: The signer’s identity was valid when it was issued, but no revocation checks could be made to validate the identity this time.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_BUSY
data.value: The device is busy. Close any apps that are using this device or wait for it to finish and then try again.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_COVER_OPEN
data.value: One or more of the device’s cover is open.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_DEVICE_COMMUNICATION
data.value: Communication with the WIA device failed. Make sure that the device is powered on and connected to the PC. If the problem persists, disconnect and reconnect the device.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_EXCEPTION_IN_DRIVER
data.value: The device driver threw an exception.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_GENERAL_ERROR
data.value: An unknown error has occurred with the WIA device.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_INCORRECT_HARDWARE_SETTING
data.value: There is an incorrect setting on the WIA device.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_INVALID_COMMAND
data.value: The device doesn't support this command.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_INVALID_DRIVER_RESPONSE
data.value: The response from the driver is invalid.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_ITEM_DELETED
data.value: The WIA device was deleted. It's no longer available.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_MAXIMUM_PRINTER_ENDORSER_COUNTER
data.value: A scan job was interrupted because an Imprinter/Endorser item reached the maximum valid value for WIA_IPS_PRINTER_ENDORSER_COUNTER, and was reset to 0. This feature is available with Windows 8 and later versions of Windows.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_MULTI_FEED
data.value: A scan error occurred because of a multiple page feed condition. This feature is available with Windows 8 and later versions of Windows.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_OFFLINE
data.value: The device is offline. Make sure the device is powered on and connected to the PC.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_PAPER_EMPTY
data.value: There are no documents in the feeder or the scanner is being occupied. Please try again later.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_PAPER_JAM
data.value: Paper is jammed in the scanner's feeder.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_PAPER_PROBLEM
data.value: An unspecified problem occurred with the scanner's feeder.

data.name: WIA_ERROR_USER_INTERVENTION
data.value: There is a problem with the WIA device. Make sure that the device is turned on, online, and any cables are properly connected.

data.name: WIA_S_NO_DEVICE_AVAILABLE
data.value: No scanner device was found. Make sure the device is online, connected to the PC, and has the correct driver installed on the PC.

data.name: WinEditorTipConvertIntroduce2

data.name: WinFeedBackEmailContentPlaceHoderContent
data.value: Please tell us the issue you encountered and the steps to reproduce it. Thank you.

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer1RegionDesc1
data.value: The region setting of your Microsoft Store is

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer1RegionDesc2
data.value: , which is inconsistent with your current location. This may lead to failure of purchase.

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer1RegionDesc4
data.value: to change your region setting of Microsoft Store.

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer2Desc1
data.value: The payment is processed by Microsoft. Please visit

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer3
data.value: Please reinstall PDFgear and purchase it with the same Microsoft account in Microsoft Store at the same price. This is to restore the purchase, and it won't charge you anymore.

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer3RestoreDesc1
data.value: If you already paid for PDFgear before, please log in the same Microsoft account in the Microsoft Store first, then

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer3RestoreDesc3
data.value: to restore purchase. If restore failed, please contact support for help.

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer4
data.value: Please click the Upgrade button in the Help tab, and click 'Restore Purchase' button below. Then PDFgear will restore purchase successfully in a few seconds.

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQAnswer5
data.value: Please check the following checkbox and turn off Hardware Acceleration. Then please try again.

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQQuestion1
data.value: Having problems in changing region setting of Microsoft Store?

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQQuestion2
data.value: Still having problems with the purchase?

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQQuestion3
data.value: Why it still asks to upgrade after I paid for PDFgear?

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQQuestion4
data.value: Why it still ask to pay when I reinstall PDFgear or install it on other devices?

data.name: WinFeedBackFAQQuestion5
data.value: Why can't I scroll PDF pages?

data.value: Please enter a valid email address to send the message successfully.

data.name: WinFeedBackSendProblemfileContent
data.value: Send the problem file to help us diagnose the problem.
